definition: showing characteristics of age, especially having grey or white hair, ice crystals forming a white deposit (especially on objects outside)
details:
adjective
- showing characteristics of age, especially having grey or white hair
= example: showing characteristics of age, especially having grey or white hair
= synonyms: hoary
noun
- ice crystals forming a white deposit (especially on objects outside)
= synonyms: rime, frost, hoarfrost
